repo.name: abendbrot

repo.description: Gentoo overlay for ebuilds related to 'hand-made' Active Home construction

repo.description: Various ebuilds, like games, media, etc...

repo.description: Some random work in progress stuff from alexxy

repo.name: amielke-overlay
repo.description: Overlay with focus on VDR and software that is not in Portage

repo.name: armagetron
repo.description: 3D light cycles, like the movie TRON

repo.name: asux
repo.description: asux' Gentoo overlay: collection of custom ebuilds

repo.name: bangert
repo.description: Some ebuilds not yet ready for mainstream portage from Thilo Bangert [bangert@gentoo.org].

repo.name: bar-overlay
repo.description: Ebuilds that end up in Funtoo ports-2012

repo.name: bazaar
repo.description: A collection of Bazaar-related ebuilds, including release candidates of Bazaar.

repo.name: betagarden
repo.description: Joint beta-quality overlay effort to reduce overlay scatter. Any dev is welcome to join.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin and CPU/GPU mining related ebuilds

repo.name: bleeding-edge
repo.description: Gentoo ebuilds for "bleeding edge" versions of packages - newest, untested - running on ~amd64.

repo.name: blueicefield
repo.description: Overlay for some packages specific to web servers (PECL, Mongo..)

repo.name: bumblebee
repo.description: Packages related to the bumblebee project

repo.name: cell

repo.name: centerim

repo.name: chutzpah
repo.description: Random stuff I am working on which isn't ready for the tree for some reason

repo.name: crossdev

repo.name: daks
repo.description: Some useful ebuilds. Includes 1C-Predpriyatie and postgres with patches for work with 1C.

repo.name: damex-overlay

repo.name: deathwing00
repo.description: Experimental ebuilds from the private overlay of Ioannis Aslanidis [deathwing00@gentoo.org].

repo.name: dertobi123

repo.name: dilfridge

repo.name: dlang

repo.name: dmol

repo.name: drdim

repo.name: DuPol

repo.name: efika

repo.name: elementary
repo.description: The elementary OS experience for Gentoo Linux.

repo.name: ephemeral
repo.description: Some roguelikes, perl modules, themes, multimedia and other utilities

repo.name: emacs
repo.description: Provide Emacs and XEmacs related ebuilds which are experimental or work-in-progress. Don't rely on them, but don't hesitate to file bugs or write emails.

repo.name: embedded-cross
repo.description: Gentoo cross-compilation overlay for embedded devices

repo.name: emery
repo.description: Ebuild testing playground of Emery Hemingway

repo.name: enlightenment
repo.description: Support for the Enlightenment project, most notably DR17/e17.

repo.name: falco
repo.description: Falco's random stuff about netmon, net-mail or security, unofficial ebuilds like proxsmtp, unofficial patches on Postfix; also pre-stable security upgrades, perhaps merged in the Security Overlay Project some day.

repo.name: finnish
repo.description: Finnish overlay for spell checking etc. etc.

repo.name: funroll-loops
repo.description: Ebuilds for webserver, osm and other software.

repo.name: funtoo-deadbeef
repo.description: Deadbeef player overlay for funtoo linux

repo.name: funtoo-overlay
repo.description: Funtoo overlay (all funtoo ebuild/eclass changes in one place)

repo.name: gamerlay
repo.description: Gamers overlay for all various games. Not related with games team.

repo.name: games
repo.description: A collection of work-in-progress ebuilds and ebuilds which require testing.

repo.name: games-overlay
repo.description: gentoo overlay containing games ebuilds only

repo.name: gbin
repo.description: Various gentoo ebuilds tweaked mainly around multimedia, python and forensics.

repo.name: gechi
repo.description: The Gechi Overlay offers a repository of Gentoo Ebuilds made by Gechi users. The scope is to cover all projects sponsored/developed by the Gechi and making them easily available.

repo.name: genstef
repo.description: Genstef's Overlay - It usually contains some experimental ebuilds on their way to the tree

repo.name: gentoo-china
repo.description: Purpose To provide some programs useful to Chinese users.

repo.name: gentoo-el
repo.description: Various ebuilds made and used by Greek Gentoo Community (gentoo-el)

repo.name: gentoo-guis
repo.description: Experimental ebuilds for Gentoo specific guis and guis related projects

repo.name: gentoo-taiwan
repo.description: A collection of ebuilds from Gentoo Taiwan.

repo.name: gentoojp

repo.name: gentoo-zh

repo.name: gentroid

repo.name: gnustep

repo.name: GoGooOS

repo.name: graaff

repo.name: graveyard
repo.description: Overlay for packages tree-cleaned from the official portage repository

repo.name: jyujin

repo.name: kde-sunset
repo.description: User-maintained overlay for old KDE packages removed from the tree, such as KDE3. Please do not file bug reports, but subscribe to the gentoo-desktop mailing list

repo.name: kerberos
repo.description: Overlay which provides the bleeding edge on the kerberos integration in gentoo.

repo.name: klondike
repo.description: Ebuilds made and modified by klondike, mainly sound and virtualization

repo.name: kolab
repo.description: Project to allow running Kolab on Gentoo.

repo.name: kork
repo.description: Cool, new, useful, and unmaintained packages

repo.name: last-hope
repo.description: A gentoo portage overlay with a set of too exotic, or unusal ebuilds for the sunrise overlay or the main tree.

repo.name: lcd-filtering
repo.description: Overlay providing patches to improve display on LCD monitors

repo.name: lif
repo.description: Third-party gentoo overlay from Agent Smith.

repo.name: liquidx
repo.description: Development overlay for ebuilds that I plan to commit to the tree that are sourced from bugzilla or liquidx.

repo.name: lisp
repo.description: Common Lisp/Scheme development, recruitment and live overlay. Support and feedback in `#gentoo-lisp' and via `gentoo-lisp@lists.gentoo.org'.

repo.name: lootr
repo.description: dev-python/netzob and maybe some i3 hacks

repo.name: lu_zero
repo.description: Experimental Media and PowerPC/CELL related ebuilds.

repo.name: lxde
repo.description: Repo for development of ebuilds for the LXDE desktop environment.

repo.name: mamona
repo.description: Mamona is an embedded Linux distribution, based on Open Embedded, for ARM EABI.

repo.name: mate
repo.description: Sabayon MATE (GNOME fork) ebuilds that could be upstreamed at some point in future (when GNOME2 will be dropped from the main tree). Bugs to http://bugs.sabayon.org

repo.name: megacoffee
repo.description: Mixed ebuilds from various sources: self-written missing ebuilds, more current ebuilds, ebuilds that just needed a slight update from official portage, ebuilds others posted on Gentoo Bugzilla, ebuilds with added patches, old ebuilds that were removed from official portage etc.

Verschiedene ebuilds aus verschiedenen Quellen: selbsterstellte ebuilds, ebuilds mit geringfügigen Änderungen, gegenüber dem aktuellen Baum, ebuilds aus Gentoos Bugzilla, ebuilds mit erweiterten patches, alte ebuilds die nicht mehr im offiziellen Baum existieren, etc.

repo.name: menelkir
repo.description: This is my personal overlay for unmaintained packages and some other addittions.

repo.name: mistafunk
repo.description: Packages mostly related to graphics and multimedia

repo.name: moonrise
repo.description: Bleeding edge, experimental overlay for Gentoo

repo.name: mozilla
repo.description: New mozilla development that is not yet in tree

repo.name: mpd
repo.description: The experimental gentoo overlay was designed as a way to keep up-to-date. Most of it are live ebuilds, ebuilds that pull the latest HEAD from whatever repository. It also includes ebuilds for clients that are not yet in portage. It is maintained by avuton, send new ebuilds, corrections or bugs directly to him.

repo.name: multimedia
repo.description: Repository for development of (mostly bleeding-edge) multimedia packages for Gentoo Linux. This is the official overlay for Gentoo's media herds.

repo.name: mv
repo.description: Ebuilds for packages not in the Gentoo tree (lack of maintainer or too experimental) and live ebuilds or extensions/bugfixes for packages in the tree

repo.name: n4g
repo.description: The goal for this overlay is to reproduce the Open Enterprise server from novell on gentoo

repo.name: n4g-experimental
repo.description: The goal for this overlay is to reproduce the Open Enterprise server from novell on gentoo

repo.description: Packages to support Nokia Internet Tablets (N8x0)

repo.description: Packages to support Nokia Internet Tablets (N900)

repo.name: nirvana

repo.name: ohnobinki
repo.description: Miscelleneous ebuild fixes and personal ebuilds

repo.name: paddymac

repo.name: pentoo

repo.name: plan9

repo.name: postgresql-experimental

repo.name: postgresql-testing
repo.description: Development overlay for PostgreSQL, testing branch.

repo.name: powerpc

repo.name: prism-overlay

repo.name: pro-audio

repo.name: progress

repo.name: pross

repo.name: pure-funtoo

repo.name: qt

repo.name: quarks
repo.description: Quarks's overlay; needful things around Gentoo Hardened, Security and Penetration Testing

repo.name: raiagent
repo.description: Well-documented ebuilds en-route to a bandersnatch near you

repo.name: rebel
repo.description: The Chamber of a Rebel – Servers, Tools and Widgets.

repo.name: regen2-overlay
repo.description: reGen2 Overlay including all changes made to Portage Tree

repo.name: rion
repo.description: Russian overlay with a some patched and specific software

repo.name: ROKO__
repo.description: Unofficial ebuilds for gentoo based distributions.

repo.name: roslin
repo.description: This is roslin, my small overlay. Enjoy! (:

repo.name: ruby
repo.description: Experimental ebuilds from the Ruby edge.

repo.name: sabayon
repo.description: Sabayon ebuilds that could be upstreamed to Gentoo (or just being useful for Gentoo users as well): hot fixes, ebuild updates, etc. For Sabayon-only ebuilds, please use the sabayon-distro overlay. Bugs to http://bugs.sabayon.org

repo.name: sabayon-distro
repo.description: Sabayon related ebuilds such as artwork, kernel binaries, split packages, etc. Bugs to http://bugs.sabayon.org

repo.name: sage-on-gentoo
repo.description: Split ebuilds for the Sage computer algebra system

repo.name: sattvik
repo.description: sattvik's overlay with personalized bug fixes and tweaks

repo.name: science
repo.description: The Gentoo Science Overlay is intended as a place to work outside of the main portage tree on experimental ebuilds. Our aim is to increase the rate of development of scientific packages for Gentoo, but ebuilds in this repository are by their very nature more experimental. If you wish to use them you should be willing to help test and report bugs. For contribution read http://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Project:Science/Contributing

repo.name: seafile
repo.description: Portage overlay to maintain seafile ebuilds

repo.name: seden
repo.description: Experimental ebuilds that are still unmaintained

repo.name: seemant
repo.description: Seemant's development overlay for django and other things.

repo.name: soor-overlay
repo.description: Gentoo ebuild overlay with misc stuff that I find interesting.

repo.name: squeezebox
repo.description: Packages for the Squeezebox network audio player from Logitech

repo.name: steam-overlay
repo.description: Gentoo overlay for Valve's Steam client and Steam-based games

repo.name: stefantalpalaru
repo.description: Gentoo overlay with ebuilds by Stefan Talpalaru that are not in the tree

repo.name: systemd
repo.description: User collaboration on ebuilds for the systemd init system

repo.name: systemd-love
repo.description: Put more love between systemd, users and openrc

repo.name: sublime-text
repo.description: Collection of ebuilds to install Sublime Text 2 or Sublime Text 3

repo.name: sunrise
repo.description: Ebuilds for bugs assigned to maintainer-wanted

repo.name: swegener
repo.description: This overlay contains some experimental stuff, but mostly stuff I quickly wrote an ebuild for or grabed it from bugzilla and did not have the time to commit it to the official tree or do not consider it ready for it.

repo.name: tarantool
repo.description: Tarantool is an in-memory database designed to store the most volatile and highly accessible web content

repo.name: tcl-8.6
repo.description: Tcl/Tk 8.8, Itcl/Itk 4 (beta) and other fixed packages.

repo.name: tcl-multislot
repo.description: Tcl/Tk multi-slot system, with tcltk eselect module for switching across multiple versions (actually: 8.4 8.5 8.6).

repo.name: thousand-parsec
repo.description: Overlay for the Thousand Parsec framework for turn-based space empire building games.

repo.name: toolchain
repo.description: Toolchain ebuilds that are unsuitable for the tree. Snapshots, unstable versions, etc...

repo.name: trapni
repo.description: trapni's private developer overlay (mostly covering YaCS/server related ebuilds for now)

repo.name: tox-overlay
repo.description: Gentoo overlay for Toxcore, Tox clients, and Tox related projects

repo.name: ubuntu
repo.description: Bring more software, themes and UI improvement from Ubuntu to Gentoo

repo.name: udev
repo.description: Overlay on udev fork without systemd

repo.name: unity-gentoo
repo.description: Overlay to install the Unity desktop

repo.name: usr-gentoo
repo.description: Auto-generated repository which moves apps to /usr

repo.name: vdr-devel
repo.description: Overlay for VDR, that contains ebuilds for development version of VDR, and specific plugins for that version.

repo.name: vdr-testing
repo.description: Development overlay for VDR, testing branch.

repo.name: venidera
repo.description: Custom overlay for use at Venidera, mostly for open cloud infrastructure (IaaS and PaaS) software from various sources

repo.name: verlihub
repo.description: Verlihub is a Direct Connect protocol server runs on Linux OS written in C++; Many features are available: MySQL database, very low use of CPU, RAM and Bandwidth, deflood integrated protection, plugins

repo.name: v-fox
repo.description: Public Gentoo overlay for games, emulators and more of nifty stuff

repo.name: viprea-overlay
repo.description: Viprea; a distribution based on Gentoo

repo.name: webapps-experimental
repo.description: This is the home of Gentoo's wider collection of ebuilds for web-based applications. This is where we collect all the ebuilds submitted to Bugzilla by our users, and make them available in an easy-to-use overlay for wider testing.

repo.name: webos
repo.description: Ported Open WebOS components and libraries

repo.name: wine-diablo3
repo.description: A gentoo overlay containing patches needed to make diablo3 install and run properly with wine

repo.name: wirelay
repo.description: wired's testing grounds and bleeding edge ebuilds

repo.name: wrobel
repo.description: A collection of stable ebuilds from Gunnar Wrobel [wrobel@gentoo.org].

repo.name: wschlich
repo.description: A collection of ebuilds from Wolfram Schlich

repo.name: xfce-dev
repo.description: Experimental ebuilds for the Xfce4 Desktop Environment

repo.name: xgr
repo.description: Ebuilds of misc packages which are not present in the Gentoo tree

repo.name: xwing
repo.description: This overlay contains some experimental stuff, such as turboprint printers driver (bug #61311), intel-536ep driver for lastest 2.6 kernels (bug #127464), lastest grisbi version (proxy maintainer) before it's portage integration and so on.

repo.name: yarik-overlay
repo.description: Some new packages plus uncommitted patches and ebuilds for the main tree

repo.name: yoreek

repo.name: yporti
